name: Mandala Generator
description:
Description

This is just a simple mandala generator using a pseudo-random value generator to create circles and leaves.
Have a zen moment !

Controls

Simply use keyboard LEFT and RIGHT arrows to generate a new mandala.

Download

Gfx

This game contains only procedurally generated graphics.

Repository

The Mercurial(hg) software management repository is available here.
